name: node-api-postgres
description: RESTful API with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL

scripts.heroku-prebuild: echo This runs before Heroku installs dependencies.
scripts.heroku-postbuild: echo This runs after Heroku installs dependencies, but before Heroku prunes and caches dependencies.
scripts.heroku-cleanup: echo This runs after Heroku prunes and caches dependencies.
